channel.title: Npc Dialogues help!
channel.description:
ahh.. just a lil question how do you fix the "click here to continue" it just goe to "Please wait.." and has no pushed buttion id so the only way i can think of is adding a pusedbutionid in the client?
if any one knows plz post how :)

item.title: Npc Dialogues help!
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

this is what i got

				sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
            			sendFrame126("", 4903);
            			sendFrame126("Greetings, I see you are a new arrivalto this land. My", 4904);
            			sendFrame126("job is to welcome all new visitors. So welcome!", 4905);
            			sendFrame126("", 4906);
            			sendFrame126("click here to continue"", 4907);
            			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
            			sendFrame164(4900);
            			NpcDialogueSend = true;

beleave me i added a case in
case 185: //clicking most buttons

that looks like this
case 4907: removeWindow(); break;

but the id 4907 is not a switch or bution id so it does not work

Read full topic
